title: Taylor Polynomial with Table part - b

content.question: Write the third-degree Taylor polynomial for h about x = 2 and use it to approximate h(1.9).

frqParts.text: Write the third-degree Taylor polynomial for h about x = 2 and use it to approximate h(1.9).

topic.text: 10.11: (BC ONLY) Finding Taylor Polynomial Approximations of Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
